attributes.additional_details:
Petition to reinstate to the train service from Beckenham Junction to Balham. This service connects this part of South London to Balham which is on the Northen Line.  This service must be regular and run to an appropriate time in the evening as well as at weekends. This service used to exist and was discontinued some years ago.
Lets get this connection back so we can have better access not only to the tube but also to SouthWest London
